data.title: Head - Software Development | 4GM Hyve Mobility
data.subtitle: October 2016 - Present | New Delhi, India
data.description:
Lead the software development of 3 Android devices with different specs and features.
Designed Pure Android experience with GMS approved apps and regular security patch updates.
Visited and collaborated with ODM's software team in China to provide best user experience.

data.title: Senoir Android Developer | 4GM Hyve Mobility
data.subtitle: December 2015 - September 2016 | New Delhi, India
data.description:
Attended Google OEM Summit 2016.
Built various customised features for our devices.

data.title: Senoir Android Developer | Flyrobe
data.subtitle: September 2015 - December 2015 | Mumbai, India
data.description:
Worked on UI/UX improvements by adapting Material Design by Google.
Collaborated with the backend team and integrated the API's given by them.
Added new features/improvements to the app as per requirements and from the user feedbacks.

data.title: Android Developer
data.subtitle: July 2013 - Present | New Delhi, India
data.description:
Developer, Programmer, UI/UX Designer and Publisher.
Attended Google Play App Excellence Summit 2017.
Over 500K downloads on Google Play.

data.title: Web Developer
data.subtitle: June 2015 - Present | New Delhi, India
data.description:
Working on some websites using MySQL and PHP for backend (Database) and CSS/HTML and JavaScript for frontend (User Interface with the ability to perform dynamic operations).
This website is also written and designed by me using Polymer and Firebase.

data.title: Recognized Developer | XDA-Developers
data.subtitle: March 2013 - Present | New Delhi, India
data.description:
ROM Developer (ArcMini & xNXT), Ported lots of applications to older versions of Android using various concepts (smali) and hacks of reverse engineering.
First to port Sony Small Apps API to Xperia™ 2011 MDPI devices.

data.title: Recognized Themer | XDA-Developers
data.subtitle: August 2012 - Present | New Delhi, India
data.description:
Designed colourful themes for CynogenMod and also for my own ROMs (Arcmini & xNXT).
Fixed various layout issues with Xperia™ apps on small screen devices (MDPI).

data.title: Trainee | HCL Infosystems Ltd.

data.description: ASP.Net and C# with A+ grade.
